page.title: 07STREET BUILDING SURVEY
page.content: The following list was drawn from our survey on the function and age of buildings along The Street of Boughton village. There are{66}pre-Victorian houses. {31}Victorian houses. {11}post-Victorian houses. {16}modern houses. There are{ 5}general stores. {5}antique shops. {3}hairdressers. {3}public houses. {2}churches. {8}other stores. Here are some conclusions.We think that the village started at the west end of The Street,because all the timber framed buildings were at that end.These are the earliest by far.Most of the modern houses were at the east end.Victorian houses were mainly ditributed throughout the middle part.
